name: d3-force-sampled
description: Fast force-directed graph layout using random sampling.

scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-force-sampled.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-sampled.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/d3-force-sampled.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-force-sampled.js build/d3-force-sampled.min.js
